alert.note: Alert for District of Columbia (District of Columbia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 23 at 2:55PM EDT until October 24 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 10 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, northeast, northern, southern and western Maryland, The District of Columbia, central, northern and northwest Virginia and eastern and panhandle West Virginia. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 10 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
